title: Verify: Integrate Zustand for State Management
description:
Run automated tests for task T-047.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Add Zustand for global state management in the frontend. Refactor workflow, execution, and settings state to use Zustand stores.
Criteria:
- Zustand is installed and configured
- Workflow, execution, and settings state managed via Zustand
- No redundant state in React context or props
acceptance_criteria: Workflow, execution, and settings state managed via Zustand
No redundant state in React context or props
